entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. How may I assist you today?
Yeah, I need to return something. I'm not happy about it either. This whole thing is a pain.
I understand your frustration. I'll do my best to help you with your return. Could you please provide me with your order number or the email address associated with your purchase?
It's under 'johndoe@email.com'. I bought a VeloBand Pulse and it's just not working out for me.
Thank you, Mr. Doe. Let me pull up your order. I see you purchased the VeloBand Pulse on August 1st. You're looking to return it now?
That's right. It's been, like, two weeks. The heart rate monitoring is completely off. Useless! I expected better from a smart watch these days.
I apologize for the issues you're experiencing with the VeloBand Pulse. Our standard return policy is 90 days. Let me go ahead and process that return for you.
90 days? Seriously? That's good to know. I thought I was going to be stuck with this thing. I looked at the return policy, but I couldn't find anything specific about how long I had.
Yes, sir. 90 days for most of our products. Just to confirm, you will be shipping the VeloBand Pulse back to us in its original packaging?
Yeah, I still have the box and everything. How do I get the shipping label? Do I have to pay for the shipping?

I'll email you a prepaid shipping label right away. Just box up the VeloBand Pulse, attach the label, and drop it off at any authorized carrier location. Once we receive the returned item, we'll process your refund. You should see the credit within 7-10 business days.
Okay, great. What if I don't see the refund in 10 days?

If you don't see the refund within 10 business days, please don't hesitate to call us back, and we'll investigate it for you. If you have any issues with the label not arriving in the next 24 hours then ask for a manager and we'll get that resent straight away.
Alright, that sounds fair. Thank you so much for your help. I was really worried I was stuck with a useless smart watch.
You're very welcome, Mr. Doe. I'm glad I could assist you. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
No, I think that's it. Thanks again!
Have a great day, Mr. Doe!
